name: Pandemic Puzzle
description:
Quarantining got you down?  This is a simple puzzle game to ease your boredom.  It's like checkers meets Mine Sweeper.  Infer the locations of invisible viral threats while navigating people across the board.  Power-ups, like masks and vaccines, are available to help you.  Get the high score!

Instructions: https://www.davejk.me/pandemic-puzzle/

THIS SOFTWARE IS EARLY ACCESS.  THE DEVELOPER SEEKS FEEDBACK FOR IMPROVING THE GAME PLAY.
